title: Schema-Aware Actions
description: Extends OCS hypermedia actions to include request/response schema references, enabling dynamic client generation, form building, and true self-documenting APIs.

_version.description: Schema version for this capability metadata.

enabled.description: Whether schema-aware actions are enabled server-wide.

schemaFormat.description: Format of schema references in actions.

inlineSchemas.description: Whether to inline small schemas in action objects (true) or always reference by URL (false).

includeExamples.description: Whether to include example request/response payloads in action schemas.
